"@ArcticEight":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/550d02e063687215edb20b00#post_550d02e063687215edb20b00
I'm about to check if derpibooru announced that they're looking for new mods or something, cause I've been on a lot of forums and whenever a forum asks for new mods the immediate reaction by people is to latch their mouth onto the staff's butt and kiss it so hard that it would take the jaws of life to pull them off.

"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/550d0357636872517ad61700#post_550d0357636872517ad61700
[bq="Thanotos Omega"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/550d02916368726b3e1f0b00#post_550d02916368726b3e1f0b00
And the site has a standing invite to apply for being a mod,[/bq]
Called it.

Dude; real talk; I've been a mod on sites before: the suck up *NEVER* gets the mod position on any site.  You know why?  Cause the suckup is normally the first one on sites to fuck up hard.  I *HIGHLY* doubt you'll get the position and even if you do chances are you'll last less than a month before you get the moderator position revoked; why?  Cause the suck up is always the first guy that goes ban happy thus resulting in swarms of complains and mass exoduses from the sites.


Why you're probably not going to get the moderator position:
End of first month, "Thanatos we have to talk; we've received a fair number of complaints about your quality of job and we've received a fair amount of advertisers pulling their ad revenue and large numbers of people leaving the site complaining about your quality of work"
